description: "I like when everybody's knees are almost touching and it feels very intimate," the Barefoot Contessa host says. Garten's new memoir is Be Ready When the Luck Happens.
title: Ina Garten shares her secret for a great dinner party: 6 people and round table

description: At least 91 people across several states were killed. Officials warned that rebuilding from the widespread loss of homes and property would be lengthy and difficult.
title: Helene death toll rises to over 90 as millions remain without power

description: Was the murder of a young Palestinian man in the West Bank an anti-gay hate crime? NPR identifies the accused killer and explores the parallel systems of justice that have yet to resolve this case.
title: An NPR investigation: A murder in Hebron

description: Amazon India says it ensures breaks and worker safety, but workers tell NPR they're pressured not to stop for water or to use the toilet, especially while processing same-day orders.
title: Amazon India workers say they're overworked and mistreated during a brutal heat wave

description: The number of people killed by flooding and landslides triggered by heavy rainfall over the weekend in Nepal has reached 193, while 31 people were still reported missing.
title: Flooding deaths in Nepal approach 200 as recovery work is stepped up
